verbose_text: Incubation of rice cells with 100 muM ABA conferred a similar level of freezing tolerance (LT 50 : -7.9 degreesC) and 75 muM ABA was likely the optimal concentration for inducing freezing tolerance in rice cells.
evidence: level of freezing tolerance (LT 50 : -7.9degreesC) and 75 muM ABA
